com.icf.iglistchanger

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icf.iglistchanger.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends Object
    This class contains static methods for opening, closing, and reading from various files used in the processing of table descriptors.
    Author:
    Dan Donahue

      • writeXHtmlFile

        public static boolean writeXHtmlFile(org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc,
                                     String filename)
        Given a org.jsoup.nodes.Document object, writes that object into a file with the given filename. This writes the file in UTF-8 encoding.
        Parameters:
        doc - - an org.jsoup.nodes.Document to be written
        filename - - pathname of file to be written to
        Returns:
        true if write was successful, false otherwise
